title: Hellish Resistance
content:
Hellish Resistance Effect Your blood protects you from flame, abyssal or otherwise. You have Resistance toFire and take only half damage from it. Requirements Tiefling

Hellish Resistance

Your blood protects you from flame, abyssal or otherwise. You have Resistance toFire and take only half damage from it.

Hellish Resistance is a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.

Hellish Resistance I
